original_text: For the horse of Pharaoh went in with his chariots and with his horsemen into the sea, and the Lord brought again the waters of the sea upon them; but the children of Israel went on dry land in the midst of the sea.
korean_text: 바로의 말과 병거와 마병이 함께 바다에 들어가매 여호와께서 바닷물을 그들 위에 되돌려 흐르게 하셨으나 이스라엘 자손은 바다 가운데서 마른 땅으로 지나간지라

sentences.original_text: For the horse of Pharaoh went in with his chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 바로의 말들이 그 전차들과 함께 들어갔으니

sentences.original_text: and with his horsemen into the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 기병들과 함께 바다로 들어갔고

sentences.original_text: and the Lord brought again the waters of the sea upon them
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들 위에 바닷물을 다시 가져오셨으나

sentences.original_text: but the children of Israel went on dry land
in the midst of the sea
